snippet: Coach Mike Woodson said he would not push the Knicks, the oldest team in the league, by holding practice on a day of rest after back-to-back games. But after three straight losses, he changed his mind.
abstract: New York Knicks coach Mike Woodson chooses practice over rest after back-to back games following three straight losses.
lead_paragraph: Coach Mike Woodson said he would not push the Knicks, the oldest team in the league, by holding practice on a day of rest after back-to-back games. But after three straight losses, he changed his mind.

headline.seo: Knicks Use Day of Rest to Focus on Defense
headline.main: After Run of Losses, Knicks Lose Day of Rest
headline.print_headline: After Run Of Losses, Knicks Lose Day of Rest
